text:
*Wpromote is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

- The Content Marketing Manager will be responsible for creating data-driven content strategies for a variety of clients across different industries.
- The ideal candidate has strong communication and time-management skills. This person would be managing multiple clients, project timelines and deadlines.
- SEO and omni-channel campaign knowledge and experience is preferred.
- Experience with reporting, Google Analytics and/or Adobe Analytics, would be a plus.
Working remote is an option (For the time being Wpromote employees continues to work remotely), however, it is preferred to be located in LA, Chicago or Dallas as our current Content Marketing team is spread across those locations. 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://www.wpromote.com/careers/95a07ddc-7a26-45da-b16d-6e76b07cac23>

<@U01P13PLN6S>
I can attest that Sam is a fabulous boss :heart: she even let me pave my own lil unique path here at Wpromote!

text:
*Life School is hiring a Researcher/Writer* :rocket:

*This is a freelance role.*

*What's the deal?* 

**Life School's mission is to make life better, one new skill at a time.**
- :memo: We do this by teaching short courses on the domestic arts (e.g., [Cooking](<https://www.trylifeschool.com/p/-table-of-contents>), [Cleaning, Home Maintenance, DIY](<https://www.trylifeschool.com/p/home-and-diy>)).
- :zap:️ Lessons are TLDR - bullet point style, 2-minute reads
**We're looking for curious researchers with a knack for writing.**
- :nerd_face: Skillsets: expert researcher, structured problem solver, crisp & punchy writer
- :purple_heart: Qualities: empathy for beginner learners, positive, can-do approach to life
**Job Description:**
- :writing_hand::skin-tone-2: Research, write, & edit lessons alongside our founder, [Michelle](<https://www.linkedin.com/in/michelletandler/>)
- :stopwatch: Ideally 10-25+ hrs/ week; competitive hourly compensation (variable)


*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:michelle@trylifeschool.com|michelle@trylifeschool.com>`
